moves.3... exd4 4. Nxd4 d6 5. Bb5: pinning a knight and attacking it with 2 pieces-rather good
moves.8... O-O 9. Qe1: going for g3, having a nice shot of the king
moves.9... h6 10. f4 Nh7: opening bishop to h4, keeps queen away from g3
moves.11. Bxc6 bxc6: no need for bishop, but his king was attacking mine.
moves.12. Nf3:
possible c5 from black
moves knight to f3, protecting h4 from bishop
moves.16... Kh8 17. Ne2 a5 18. f5:
nice little trick
he fell right in
moves.18... Bxf5: opens my F line for rooks
moves.19. Nfd4:
Forks bishop and pawn
Pins bishop to pawn with rook
moves.22... Ra6 23. Nxe6 Qxe6 24. Bxc5 Rxc6 25: Protects pawn until end of game
